gallery.title: Kliniek
gallery.subtitle: Discover our modern spaces and state-of-the-art equipment

team.title: Clinical Team
team.subtitle: Our team of specialist doctors is committed to offering the best care with excellence and dedication in the IAL standard

leonardo.bio: Dentist specializing in Radiology and Stomatology. Precise diagnosis and comprehensive view of oral health.

daiane.bio: Dentist specializing in Endodontics, focused on precision treatments and dental preservation.

carla.bio: Oral and Maxillofacial Surgeon with a Master's in Dental Medicine. Dedicated to aesthetic and functional smile rehabilitation.

marcos.bio: Over 17 years of clinical experience. Postgraduate in Dermatology (ISMD) and specialist in Hair Transplant.

aline.bio: Oral and Maxillofacial Surgeon trained in Advanced Facial Harmonization. Focused on natural and balanced results.

pethine.bio: Dentist specializing in Pediatric Dentistry. Humanized care focused on children's well-being and comfort.

sara.bio: Dentist working in integrated clinical dentistry and personalized approach for each patient.

yara.bio: Tandarts werkzaam in Algemene Tandheelkunde en Orale Esthetiek. Behandeling gericht op mondgezondheid gecombineerd met esthetiek, met focus op natuurlijke, functionele en gepersonaliseerde resultaten voor elke patiënt.

patricia.bio: Plastisch Chirurg erkend voor excellentie in borstchirurgie, combineert zorg, techniek en natuurlijkheid. Werkzaam in borstvergroting, -verkleining en prothesewissel, evenals HD Lipo met natuurlijke definitie.

federica.bio: Werkzaamheden gericht op preventie, behoud van mondgezondheid en gepersonaliseerde begeleiding van patiënten, met aandacht voor comfort, techniek en continue zorg.

arethuza.bio: Dentist specializing in Orthodontics, Orthopedics and Facial Harmonization. Master Injector Swift Beauty (NY) and Advanced Orofacial Harmonization (Miami).

stats.title: Your Health in Numbers
stats.subtitle: More than numbers, these are stories of lives transformed by an excellent multidisciplinary team.
stats.footer_text: Building smiles for over two decades

treatments.title: Treatments
treatments.description:
Here, we treat smiles as an extension of each patient's identity.

We combine cutting-edge technology, multidisciplinary care, and aesthetic sensitivity to transform not just the smile — but also how you see and feel about yourself.

All with comfort, precision, and the excellence that makes Instituto Areluna a reference in oral rehabilitation.
treatments.discover_label: DISCOVER THE IDEAL TREATMENT FOR YOU

cta.title: Meet your best version
cta.description: Schedule a consultation and discover how we can make your dreams come true with our personalized treatments and high technology.

1.title: Dental Aesthetics
1.description: Advanced aesthetic treatments for complete smile transformation.

2.title: Invisible Aligners
2.description: Discreet orthodontic correction with removable transparent aligners.

3.title: Traditional Orthodontics
3.description: Orthodontic treatment with brackets for malocclusion correction.

4.title: Implantology and Advanced Surgery
4.description: Dental implants and oral surgeries with cutting-edge technology.

5.title: Endodontics
5.description: Root canal treatment for preservation of compromised teeth.

6.title: Periodontology
6.description: Specialized treatment of gums and support structures.

7.title: Collagen Biostimulators
7.description: Sculptra and Radiesse for natural facial collagen stimulation.

8.title: Double Chin Lipoenzymatic
8.description: Non-surgical reduction of localized fat in the chin region.

9.title: Facial Support Threads
9.description: Non-surgical facial lifting with absorbable threads for firmness.

10.title: Dark Circles Filling
10.description: Correction of dark circles and hollows with high-quality hyaluronic acid.

11.title: Non-Surgical Rhinoplasty
11.description: Nose correction with hyaluronic acid without the need for surgery.

12.title: Medical Peels
12.description: Chemical and enzymatic peels for renewal and rejuvenation.

13.title: Skinbooster and Mesotherapy
13.description: Deep hydration and revitalization of facial skin.

14.title: Rejuvenation with PRP
14.description: Platelet-Rich Plasma for natural skin regeneration.

16.title: Body Radiofrequency
16.description: Treatment for body flaccidity with radiofrequency technology.

17.title: Body Mesotherapy
17.description: Treatment for localized fat and cellulite with microinjections.

18.title: Lymphatic Drainage
18.description: Specialized massage for post-surgical recovery and well-being.

19.title: Hair PRP
19.description: Platelet-Rich Plasma to stimulate hair growth.

20.title: Capillary Microinfusion (MMP)
20.description: Infusion of medications directly into the scalp.

21.title: Hair Mesotherapy
21.description: Application of vitamins and nutrients for hair strengthening.

22.title: FUE Transplant
22.description: FUE technique without visible cuts for natural hair transplant.

23.title: Evaluation with Dermatoscopy
23.description: Advanced digital analysis of the scalp before transplant.

24.title: Anti-inflammatory Nutrition
24.description: Nutritional plans to combat inflammation and optimize health.

25.title: Hormonal Evaluation
25.description: Complete hormonal profile analysis for adults and youths.

26.title: Dental Anxiety Support
26.description: Specialized support for patients with fear or dental trauma.

checkup.description: Een uitgebreide en geïntegreerde beoordeling die tandheelkunde, gezichtsathetiek, haarnalyse en laboratoriumtests combineert in slechts één dag.

dental.title: Volledige Tandheelkundige Beoordeling
dental.description: Gedetailleerd mondonderzoek, panoramische röntgenfoto's en persoonlijk behandelplan

hair.title: Geavanceerde Haaranalyse
hair.description: Digitale trichoscopie, dichtheidsanalyse en evaluatie voor haartransplantatie

labs.title: Laboratoriumtests
labs.description: Hormonaal profiel, vitaminen, mineralen en algemene gezondheidsmarkers

one_day.title: Alles in 1 Dag
one_day.description: Volledige beoordeling in slechts één bezoek

integrated_care.title: Geïntegreerde Zorg
integrated_care.description: Holistische benadering van uw gezondheid en esthetiek

before_after.title: Glimlach Galerij
before_after.subtitle: Echte Transformaties
before_after.description: Zie hoe we glimlachen transformeren en levens veranderen met onze geavanceerde behandelingen. Elk geval is uniek en gepersonaliseerd om uitzonderlijke resultaten te bereiken.

cta.text: Plan uw consult en ontdek hoe we uw glimlach kunnen transformeren met natuurlijke en blijvende resultaten.

1.desc: Totale orale revalidatie met vaste protheses

contact.description: Neem contact met ons op en plan uw consult. Wij staan klaar om voor u te zorgen met de hoogste normen van kwaliteit en excellentie.

toasts.config_error_desc: Kon het bericht niet verzenden. Probeer het later opnieuw of neem telefonisch contact met ons op.
toasts.success_desc: We nemen zo snel mogelijk contact met u op.
toasts.error_desc: Er is een fout opgetreden bij het verzenden van uw bericht. Probeer het opnieuw.

footer.description: Wij transformeren glimlachen met 25 jaar ervaring, met behulp van de meest geavanceerde technieken en technologieën voor uitzonderlijke en natuurlijke resultaten.

cookie_banner.title: Uw privacy is belangrijk
cookie_banner.description: Wij gebruiken cookies om uw browse-ervaring te verbeteren, siteverkeer te analyseren en inhoud te personaliseren. Door op "Accepteren" te klikken, stemt u in met ons gebruik van cookies. U kunt meer lezen in ons <0>Privacybeleid</0>.
